channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-306] Support "INSERT [INTO] destination"
item.description: Currently hive only supports "INSERT OVERWRITE destination". We should support "INSERT [INTO] destination".

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: With hadoop appends becoming stable I think its time. Do you have any ideas for this? Is it something I can help with?
Which hadoop release supports appends - is it in 20 or 21 ?
Ping?

Which hadoop release supports appends - is it in 20 or 21 ?

There are currently two versions of append in Hadoop. The original append in 20, was quite buggy but has been improved to support hbase. The latest CDH releases have these improvements. In Apache 21, a new version of append was released. However, 21 is not a production release. Future Apache releases are expected to use the new append.
implements INSERT INTO for non bucketized tables and partitions

-----------------------------------------------------------
